text: COP29 unpacked: wins, losses, and controversies COP29 took place in November in Baku, Azerbaijan, delivering a mix of controversy, breakthroughs, and setbacks. Florence STG researcher Jacopo Bencini, who attended in person, shares his insights on the event’s mixed outcomes.
